paintcanvas

Class DrawTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • paintcanvas.DrawTool
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleTool, CutAndMoveTool, EllipseTool, EraseTool, FillTool, FreeDrawTool, GrabColorTool, ImageFillTool, IrregularPolygonTool, LineTool, RainbowFunFillTool, RectangleTool, RegularPolygonTool, SelectAndMoveTool, SquareTool, StarTool, TextTool

    public abstract class DrawTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class which is a model for the tools a PaintCanvas can use.
